summary: Smosh is an American comedy group that started in 2002 as a website for animations. It became famous on YouTube in 2005 with funny videos created by Anthony Padilla and Ian Hecox. They gained over 26 million subscribers and 10 billion views. The brand expanded with different channels like ElSmosh and Smosh Games. In 2017, Padilla left, and in 2018, their parent company closed suddenly. The Smosh team continued independently and joined Mythical Entertainment. Recently, in 2023, Padilla and Hecox bought Smosh back, making it independent again.
title: Smosh
